00009 - (id)init
00010 {
00011     if (self = [super init])
00012     {
00013         _tests = [];
00014     }
00015     return self;
00016 }

00018 - (id)initWithName:(CPString)aName
00019 {
00020     if (self = [self init])
00021     {
00022         [self setName:aName];
00023     }
00024     return self;
00025 }
00026 
00027 - (id)initWithClass:(Class)aClass
00028 {
00029     if (self = [self init])
00030     {
00031         var superClass = aClass,
00032             names = [];
00033         while (superClass)
00034         {
00035             var methods = class_copyMethodList(superClass);
00036             for (var i = 0; i < methods.length; i++)
00037             {
00038                 [self addTestMethod:methods[i].name names:names class:aClass]
00039             }
00040         
00041             superClass = superClass.super_class;
00042         }
00043     
00044         if ([_tests count] == 0)
00045             CPLog.warn("No tests");
00046     }
00047         
00048     return self;
00049 }
00050 
00051 - (id)initWithClass:(Class)aClass name:(CPString)aName
00052 {
00053     [self initWithClass:aClass];
00054     [self setName:aName];
00055 }
00056 
00057 - (void)addTest:(OJTest)aTest
00058 {
00059     [_tests addObject:aTest];
00060 }
00061 
00062 - (void)addTestSuite:(Class)aTestClass
00063 {
00064     [self addTest:[[OJTestSuite alloc] initWithClass:aTestClass]];
00065 }
00066 
00067 - (void)addTestMethod:(SEL)selector names:(CPArray)names class:(Class)aClass
00068 {
00069     if ([names containsObject:selector] || ![self isTestMethod:selector])
00070         return;
00071         
00072     [names addObject:selector];
00073     [self addTest:[self createTestWithSelector:selector class:aClass]];
00074 }
00075 
00076 - (OJTest)createTestWithSelector:(SEL)selector class:(Class)aClass
00077 {
00078     var initSelector = [self getTestConstructor:aClass];
00079     
00080     var test;
00081     if (selector.indexOf(":") < 0)
00082     {
00083         test = [[aClass alloc] performSelector:initSelector];
00084         if ([test isKindOfClass:[OJTestCase class]])
00085             [test setSelector:selector];
00086     }
00087     else
00088     {
00089         test = [aClass performSelector:initSelector withObject:selector];
00090     }
00091         
00092     return test;
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (void)isTestMethod:(SEL)selector
00096 {
00097     return selector.substring(0,4) == "test" && selector.indexOf(":") == -1;
00098 }
00099 
00100 - (SEL)getTestConstructor:(Class)aClass
00101 {
00102     return "init";
00103 }
00104 
00105 - (void)run:(OJTestResult)result
00106 {
00107     for (var i = 0; i < _tests.length; i++)
00108     {
00109         if ([result shouldStop])
00110             break;
00111             
00112         [_tests[i] run:result];
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 - (CPString)name
00117 {
00118     return _name;
00119 }
00120 
00121 - (void)setName:(CPString)aName
00122 {
00123     _name = aName;
00124 }
00125 
00126 - (int)countTestCases
00127 {
00128     var count = 0;
00129     for (var i = 0; i < _tests.length; i++)
00130         [_tests[i] countTestCases];
00131     return count;
00132 }
